textContent:
Do I need to pay the fees before being able to apply to the student visa?
I figure you are familiar with the insurance provider CBHS. Is it a valid alternative to your suggested provider?
I have an australian bank account where I keep most of my savings, but I am currently outside the country. Can I make the bank transfer from my australian account the same way as if I was in Australia? Or do I need to use my home country's bank account?
textContentHtml:
Do I need to pay the fees before being able to apply to the student visa?

I figure you are familiar with the insurance provider CBHS. Is it a valid alternative to your suggested provider?

I have an australian bank account where I keep most of my savings, but I am currently outside the country. Can I make the bank transfer from my australian account the same way as if I was in Australia? Or do I need to use my home country's bank account?
